availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Davis (Scioto County, Ohio, farmer and banker.)

body.p: Scioto County, Ohio, farmer and banker. Ohio native. Married to Sarah Davis. Father of Emma Davis and Charles Davis. Farmer in Portsmouth, Ohio, in 1860. Partner in the Banking House of Thomas Dugan & Co. in Portsmouth in 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Scioto County, Clay Township, p. 17; "George Davis Dead," The Cincinnati Enquirer (Cincinnati, O.), January 12, 1894, p. 6; KYR-0001-007-0392.
